name: assassin
text: Announce a character you wish to murder. The murdered character misses his entire turn.

name: thief
text: Announce a character from whom you wish to steal. When the player with this card is revealed, take his gold.

name: magician
text: You may either exchange your cards with another player or discard any Number of cards and draw an equal Number of cards.

name: king
text: You receive on gold for each noble (yellow) district in your city. When the King is called, you immediately receive the crown counter.

name: bishop
text: You receive one gold for each religious (blue) district in your city. Your districts may not me destroyed by the Warlord.

name: merchant
text: You receive one gold for each trade (green) district in your city. When you take an action, you recieve one extra gold.

name: architect
text: After you take an action, draw two extra cards and put both in your hand. You may build up to three districts during your turn.

name: warlord
text: You receive one gold for each military (red) district in your city. You may pay to destroy one district of your choice.
